[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [useOptionalEditor](./extensions.useoptionaleditor.md)

## useOptionalEditor variable

Provides access to Item Editor data and methods, if available. `undefined` is returned when used outside of Item Editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useOptionalEditor: OptionalEditorHook;
```
